pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complementary Genomic Functions // Presents a series of molecular and genetic routines in the R environment with the aim of assisting in analytical pipelines before and after the use of 'asreml' or another library to perform analyses such as Genomic Selection or Genome-Wide Association Analyses. Methods and examples are described in Gezan, Oliveira, Galli, and Murray (2022) https://asreml.kb.vsni.co.uk/wp- content/uploads/sites/3/ASRgenomics_Manual.pdf.
